articles.title: The Elder Scrolls Online: Lost Depths patch notes cause community uproar - TrueAchievements
articles.description: The Elder Scrolls Online: Lost Depths DLC and Update 35 have been announced and implemented on the Public Test Server, and it's fair to say that a large portion of the PvE community isn't too pleased with the proposed DPS nerfing.
articles.content: The upcoming Lost Depths DLC and Update 35 are the next wave of content updates coming to The Elder Scrolls Online, and while we won't see them added to the public builds until August 22nd for PC and… [+4352 chars]
